nodes.text: The Nhar'qual Rift was one of the largest rifts in the Adsila Rifts. Rumored to be bottomless, probes registered a depth of at least four hundred and fifty kilometers before contact was lost. "Nhar'qual" translated to "dark death" in Olys Corellisi, and for a time it was used as an execution site for criminals. Members of the Black Bha'lir gathered at the Nhar'qual Rift to settle disputes among its members.
